name: Online Munim
tagline: Online Munim - Jewellery and Money Lending Software, Accounting Software, Retail Business Software
body:
### Welcome to Online Munim.
OMUNIM is advance money lending and jewellery software. It easily manages customer records as well as money lending inventory, sales, purchase, bar-code tagging, customer tracking, invoices, payment options and much more. We also provide finger scan, automatically weight from weighing scale and vikram samvat hindi month's date loans entry.

### Designer Templates
Weâ€™ve crafted some handsome templates for you to use. Go ahead and click 'Continue to layouts' to browse through them. You can easily go back to edit your page before publishing. After publishing your page, you can revisit the page generator and switch to another theme. Your Page content will be preserved.

We are into business of accounting software. We have wide ranges of softwares in this domain. IT includes OMLOAN and OMREVO both are basic moneylending software, OMGOLD is jewellery software and OMUNIM is the combination of both jewellery and accounting software.
